citation_details.title: Motion-BIDS: an extension to the brain imaging data structure to organize motion data for reproducible research
citation_details.author: S Jeung, H Cockx, S Appelhoff, T Berg, K Gramann
citation_details.abstract: We present an extension to the Brain Imaging Data Structure (BIDS) for motion data. Motion  data is frequently recorded alongside human brain imaging and electrophysiological data.
citation_details.short_author: S Jeung, H Cockx, S Appelhoff, et al.
